entities.name: yule ball
entities.description: The Yule Ball is mentioned as an event where students are attending, and it seems to be a formal gathering with music and dancing.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts who stands up and asks the students to do the same. He then conjures a raised platform into existence for the Weird Sisters to perform on.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the champions who is attending the Yule Ball and is watching the Weird Sisters perform. He seems to be interested in their music.

entities.name: weird sisters
entities.description: The Weird Sisters are a band that performs at the Yule Ball. They are described as being extremely hairy and dressed in black robes with ripped and torn edges.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is hosting the Yule Ball, as he stands up to ask the students to do the same and conjures a raised platform for the Weird Sisters to perform on.
The Weird Sisters are performing at the Yule Ball, as they trooped up onto the stage and started playing their instruments.
Harry is watching the Weird Sisters perform at the Yule Ball, as he seems to be interested in their music and almost forgot what was coming.
